member.summary: Level in this language, dictates the grade of the player

member.summary: The calibre of a developer in a language, marked by a letter grade. These letters range from F to S++

member.summary: The speed multiplier of a language. Affects how fast you complete the learning session.

member.name: P:Idle.Core.Fields.Framework.XPMult
member.summary: The XP multiplier of a language. Affects how much the language XP increase upon completion of a session.

member.name: T:Idle.DataAccess.Player
member.summary: Player Class. Everything happens here.

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.Username
member.summary: Player's name

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.XP
member.summary: XP of the player, dictates the level of the player

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.Level
member.summary: Level of the player, dictates the grade of the player

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.Coins
member.summary: Number of coins the player has (In-Game Currency)

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.Grade
member.summary: The calibre of a developer, marked by a letter grade. These letters range from F to S++

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.SpeedMult
member.summary: The speed multiplier of a player. Affects how fast you complete a learning or job session. This is an overall multiplier, that applies to all sessions

member.name: P:Idle.DataAccess.Player.XPMult
member.summary: The XP multiplier of a player. Affects how much the player XP increases as you level up in a field. This does not affect how much XP is earned from field sessions.

member.summary: Basic Constructor that takes in no arguments. Sets username to a default value.

member.summary: Constructor that takes in a DTO to assign values.

member.summary: Overriden ToString() method
member.returns: Returns a formatted string containing the players fields, items, coins, xp, level, etc.
